D

DataManager - Class in Manager
Represents the DataManager of MoblimaApp that provides the read and write methods using serializable to manipulate binary files.
DataManager(String) - Constructor for class Manager.DataManager
Initialises the DataManager object which creates a "database" folder in the root directory of the application.
DataManager(String, String) - Constructor for class Manager.DataManager
Initialises the DataManager object which creates a "database" folder in the root directory of the application.
dayRate - Variable in class Entities.Showtime
Day Rates will be stored in a HashMap with day type as key and the corresponding rates as key-values.
deleteAdmin(String) - Method in class Manager.UserManager
Allows the delete of an existing Admin type User Object when given the email.
deleteAdminUser() - Method in class UI
Method for Admin User to delete another existing Admin User upon validating with the Admin General Password.
deleteMovieListing() - Method in class UI
Method for Admin User to delete existing movie listing.
deleteShowtimes() - Method in class UI
Method for Admin User to delete existing showtimes.
displayDayOption(int) - Method in class Manager.ShowtimeManager
This method allows the input of the number of days to choose from for making amendments to the particular day's showtime.
displayTimeOption(int, int) - Method in class Manager.ShowtimeManager
This methods allow choosing the time slots of the selected day for making amendments to showtime.
